name: The Empty Inn
description: The Empty Inn is a 2D, exploration game with 8-bit, NES-style, pixel art and puzzle gameplay. With only a small lamp in hand, the player is required to solve puzzles and explore the vacant inn, ensuring they keep their lamp lit along the way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or up Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space
